Posts.Content: Sep 9, 2007 08:14PM lorna1966 wrote: I was the Radiation Oncology Medical Assistant at the cancer center I worked at in California. I don't remember everything, but I know we used Strontium 89, but during my time there, it was only on patients with metastatic Prostate Mets. Shepgirl is right about the blastic & lytic lesions, which is probably why we never treated breast ca patients. Good luck to you, Lorna
Posts.Title: Stronium-89 badboob67 lorna1966
